com.tigertext.ttandroid

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tigertext.ttandroid.message.MessageData
      • com.tigertext.ttandroid.message.MessageParse
        • com.tigertext.ttandroid.Message
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.os.Parcelable, java.lang.Comparable<MessageData>, java.util.Comparator<MessageData>

    public class Message
extends MessageParse
implements android.os.Parcelable
    Represents a message.

    Note: if isGroup() returns true, then getRecipientId() returns the group token.

      • fromJson

        public static Message fromJson(org.json.JSONObject json)
                        throws org.json.JSONException
        Creates a Message from the given JSON with by default messageType MESSAGE_TYPE_REGULAR, indicating this Message is not a bang.
        Parameters:
        json - JSON containing data to compose a Message object
        Returns:
        A Message
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - thrown when there is an error parsing

      • fromJson

        public static Message fromJson(int messageType,
                               org.json.JSONObject json)
                        throws org.json.JSONException
        Creates a Message from the given JSON and the given messageType.
        Parameters:
        json - JSON containing data to compose a Message object
        messageType - int containing the message type indicating whether it is a regular message or a bang.
        Returns:
        A Message
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException - thrown when there is an error parsing
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown when there is an invalid messageType given. Invalid message types include 0, and 1.
